mapper.select: SELECT s.scd_sq, s.scd_div_sq, d.scd_div_nm, s.emp_sq, s.scd_nm, s.scd_pst, s.scd_sday, s.scd_eday, s.scd_dct FROM SCD s, SCD_DIV d WHERE scd_sq = #{scd_sq} AND s.scd_div_sq = d.scd_div_sq
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCD (scd_sq, scd_div_sq, emp_sq, scd_nm, scd_pst, scd_sday, scd_eday, scd_dct) VALUES (#{scd_sq}, #{scd_div_sq}, #{emp_sq}, #{scd_nm}, #{scd_pst}, #{scd_sday}, #{scd_eday}, #{scd_dct})
